assumevalid.title: Assume Valid Chain History
assumevalid.description: If this block is in the chain assume that it and its ancestors are valid and potentially skip their script verification (0 to verify all)

blockfilterindex.title: Block Filter Index
blockfilterindex.description: Maintain an index of compact filters by block. If set to 1, certain indexes are enabled (currently just basic)

blocksxor.title: Block Data XOR
blocksxor.description: Whether an XOR-key applies to blocksdir *.dat files. The created XOR-key will be zeros for an existing blocksdir or when 0 is set, and random for a freshly initialized blocksdir

loadblock.title: Import Blocks From File
loadblock.description: Imports blocks from external blk000??.dat file on startup. This option can be set multiple times with different file values

title: Networking
description: How your node interacts with other peers on the network

onlynet.title: Only Use Specific Network
onlynet.description: Make automatic outbound connections only to the selected network. Inbound and manual connections are not affected by this option. It can be specified multiple times to allow multiple networks

title: Mempool
description: What transactions your node will relay to peers

minrelaytxfee.title: Minimum Transaction Relay Fee
minrelaytxfee.description: Fees (in BTC/kvB) smaller than this are considered zero fee for relaying, mining and transaction creation

title: Mining
description: Attributes of blocks that can be mined by your node

title: RPC
description: Security and performance options for accessing your node's RPC interface

title: ZeroMQ
description: Options for handling notifications emitted via ZeroMQ

checkblocks.title: Check Blocks
checkblocks.description: How many blocks to check at startup (0 = all)

checklevel.title: Check Blocks Level
checklevel.description: How thorough the block verification of checkblocks is: level 0 reads the blocks from disk, level 1 verifies block validity, level 2 verifies undo data, level 3 checks disconnection of tip blocks, level 4 tries to reconnect the blocks, each level includes the checks of the previous levels
